A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I saw Star Wars in 1977 as my 7th Birthday Present\, and I have been a devoted fan since that day...
Every following Star Wars Movie has reawakened the awe and excitement that the 7 year old child I once was had felt on that momentous occasion...
The Last Jedi abused and destroyed my Inner Child...
This travesty of a movie is an insult to any True Follower of the Star Wars Universe...
I will NEVER watch anything with the Star Wars name attached in future...
Thanks For Nothing Disney\, I will NEVER forgive you for this...
